backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with authorization, blob storage, and user/member management types for profiles, memberships, payments, expenses, bookings, workouts, diet plans, and reporting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report placeholder containing an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files, describing components, hooks, and functionality across the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH variable definitions for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, identity loading, error states, and routing to admin or member dashboards.
frontend/src/components/admin/Communicat: Static alert component explaining that communication logs are simulated and not actually sent.
Displays simulated communication logs and member credentials after manual member creation, with copy-to-clipboard actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/FinancialM: Admin interface for viewing, adding, editing, and deleting payments and expenses, with dialogs and status management.
frontend/src/components/admin/MemberMana: Full admin member management UI supporting creation, editing, deletion, search, pagination, QR code display, and membership plan handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/Membership: Provides UI to view, edit, and delete membership plans using dialogs and table listings.
frontend/src/components/admin/Reports.ts: Fetches and displays gym reports including revenue, expenses, membership stats, and charts.
frontend/src/components/admin/StaffManag: Placeholder component indicating future staff and trainer management features.
Reusable layout for admin and member dashboards with theme toggle, profile menu, logout handling, and profile picture modal support.
frontend/src/components/member/Attendanc: Displays a member’s attendance records sorted by date, with check-in/out times and durations.
frontend/src/components/member/ClassBook: Allows members to book, view, and cancel class bookings with dialog forms and status badges.
frontend/src/components/member/MemberOve: Shows member profile, membership status, profile picture, and monthly attendance summary.
frontend/src/components/member/MemberPor: Aggregates member data into a dashboard showing profile, attendance, bookings, payments, and notifications.
frontend/src/components/member/MyDiet.ts: Displays the member's diet plan with macros and meals, handling loading and missing-plan states.
frontend/src/components/member/MyWorkout: Shows the member's workout plan with duration and exercises, with loaders and fallback when no plan exists.
frontend/src/components/member/Notificat: Renders prioritized, dismissible notifications with icons, colors, and optional action buttons.
frontend/src/components/member/PaymentWa: Fetches and displays payment history, totals, and status badges with error handling and retry support.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePictureMo: Dialog component for viewing enlarged profile pictures with close controls and click‑to‑dismiss behavior.
User profile settings UI that loads, edits, and saves profile data, including role management and profile picture updates.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/QRCodeDialog.tsx: Generates and displays a QR code for a member, with options to copy the encoded data and close the dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, status tracking, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user roles, profiles, and authentication, with serialization helpers for member profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard layout with tabs for members, financials, staff, and reports.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements Internet Identity and email/password login UI with error handling and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/MemberDashboard.tsx: Wraps the member portal inside the member dashboard layout.
frontend/src/pages/TrainerDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder for the trainer dashboard page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the current state of the Prime Fit Gym app, including project version, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of implemented feature entries. Used as a centralized reference for fixing notification delivery, member auth, and reporting problems.
